Enable.name: Enable Task
Enable.help:
Join this task to scheduler.
Task commission, research, reward are force to enable.

NextRun.name: Next Run
NextRun.help:
Updated automatically after completing the task to set next scheduled run, typically not manually modified
However you can force immediate scheduling if you clear this text field

SuccessInterval.name: Success Interval
SuccessInterval.help: After successful, postpone next run for X minutes

FailureInterval.name: Failure Interval
FailureInterval.help: After failure, postpone next run for X minutes

ServerUpdate.name: Server Update
ServerUpdate.help: Series of server refresh time(s) as to when this task will next run, this is automatically converted to respective time zone, generally do not need to modify

Serial.name: Serial
Serial.help:
Common emulator Serial can be queried in the list below
Use "auto" to auto-detect emulators, but if multiple emulators are running or use emulators that do not support auto-detect, "auto" cannot be used and serial must be filled in manually
Default serial for select emulators:
- BlueStacks 127.0.0.1:5555
- BlueStacks4 Hyper-V use "bluestacks4-hyperv", "bluestacks4-hyperv-2" for multi instance, and so on
- BlueStacks5 Hyper-V use "bluestacks5-hyperv", "bluestacks5-hyperv-1" for multi instance, and so on
- NoxPlayer 127.0.0.1:62001
- NoxPlayer64bit 127.0.0.1:59865
- MuMuPlayer/MuMuPlayer X 127.0.0.1:7555
- MuMuPlayer12 127.0.0.1:16384
- MemuPlayer 127.0.0.1:21503
- LDPlayer emulator-5554 or 127.0.0.1:5555
If there are multiple emulator instances running, the default is reserved for one of them and the others will use different serials to avoid conflicts
Open console.bat and run `adb devices` to find them or follow the emulator's official tutorial

PackageName.name: Game Server
PackageName.help: Manual select is required if multiple game clients are installed on emulator

ServerName.name: Server in Game Client
ServerName.help:
Select the server where you are in the game to enable server status detection
Script will hang up when server is being maintained or network is broken

ScreenshotMethod.name: Screenshot Method
ScreenshotMethod.help:
When using auto-select, a benchmark will be performed and automatically changed to the fastest screenshot method.
General speed: DroidCast_raw >> aScreenCap_nc > ADB_nc >>> aScreenCap > uiautomator2 ~= ADB.
Run Tools - Performance Test to find the fastest method.

ControlMethod.name: Control Method
ControlMethod.help:
Speed: minitouch > Hermit >>> uiautomator2 ~= ADB
minitouch is recommended, hermit is not recommended unless on vmos

ScreenshotDedithering.name: Image Color De-dithering
ScreenshotDedithering.help: Enable when running Alas on phones

AdbRestart.name: Try to restart adb when no device found

_info.name: Emulator Settings
_info.help: The following values are auto-filled according to "Serial", if you don’t understand, please don't modify them

HandleError.name: Enable Exception Handling
HandleError.help: Handles select exceptions, will retreat if in battle

SaveError.name: Record Exception
SaveError.help: Records exception and log into directory for review or sharing

OnePushConfig.name: Error notify config
OnePushConfig.help:
When Alas cannot handle exception, send a message through Onepush. Configuration document: 
https://github.com/LmeSzinc/AzurLaneAutoScript/wiki/Onepush-configuration-%5BEN%5D

ScreenshotLength.name: Record Screenshot(s)
ScreenshotLength.help: Number of screenshots saved when exception occurs

ScreenshotInterval.name: Take Screenshots Every X Second(s)
ScreenshotInterval.help: Minimum interval between 2 screenshots, limited in 0.1 ~ 0.3, can help reduce CPU on high-end PCs

CombatScreenshotInterval.name: Take Screenshots Every X Second(s) In Combat
CombatScreenshotInterval.help: Minimum interval between 2 screenshots, limited in 0.3 ~ 1.0, can help reduce CPU during battle

TaskHoardingDuration.name: Hoard Tasks For X Minute(s)
TaskHoardingDuration.help:
By purposely not adding ready tasks to pending, allows for larger subsets to be built and run en masse at a later time
Can reduce the frequency of operating AL

WhenTaskQueueEmpty.name: When Task Queue is Empty
WhenTaskQueueEmpty.help: Close AL when there are no pending tasks, can help reduce CPU

AzurStatsID.name: AzurStat ID
AzurStatsID.help: Used to identify your upload to <https://azur-stats.lyoko.io>, the ID consists of random characters and can be changed at any time

API.name: Upload API
API.help: If CN users cannot connect to AzurStat, recommend to use "reverse proxy"

RetireMode.name: Retirement Mode
RetireMode.help:
If mode is one click retire, in game retire settings are enforced
If mode is enhance but unable to do so, will fallback to one click retire as default

KeepLimitBreak.name: Keep Copies of Max LB Ships
KeepLimitBreak.help:
If you own multiple copies of a ship that has not been fully Limit Broken, this option determines what you want to do with those copies.
If one-click retire cannot retire ships, please set to "Don't Keep"

Filter.name: Ship Type(s) Filter for Enhance
Filter.help:
"cv > bb > ..."; may substitute a type with "?" to have Alas select a type at random
Must enter at least 1 whitespace character to disable type filtering

CheckPerCategory.name: Number Checked Per Category for Enhance
CheckPerCategory.help:
Restricts the number of ships to be checked per category before moving onto the next if any
Suitable enhance material is checked continously until reaching the unenhanceable state (in battle or stat full), after which this number is decremented for the current session
Recommend to configure 3+ if there are non-max level ships in active fleet else <= 2 is generally sufficient

_info.name: Old Retire Settings
_info.help:
Only applies to "Old Retire".
Note that old retire is based on rarity, it will retire Bulins

_info.name: Task status
_info.help: Store internal status of the task. Clear manually when the task is abnormal

Toast.DisableTranslateMode: Click here to disable translate mode
Toast.ClickToUpdate: New update available, click here to update

AddAlas.FileExist: A config with the same name exists, please choose another one
AddAlas.InvalidChar: Config name cannot contain any of the following characters: .\/:*?"<>|

AppManage.NameExist: A config with the same name exists, please choose another one
AppManage.InvalidChar: Config name cannot contain any of the following characters: .\/:*?"<>|
AppManage.OverrideWarning: This will override the current config!
AppManage.Name: Name

Update.UpdateWait: Waiting for all alas complete current task
Update.UpdateFailed: Update failed. Logs can be found in ./log/*_gui.txt
Update.Author: Author
Update.DisabledWarn: Updater module is disabled. You need to manually restart Alas to update

Remote.NotRunning: Not running, server disconnected or offline
Remote.NotEnable: Disabled, set webui password in deploy.yaml and enable remote access
Remote.SSHNotInstall: No SSH command in your system. Please refer to the tutorial to download or install one
